snippet: Bernhard Laufer, who emailed a death threat to the head of an Islamic nonprofit organization, was sentenced to 13 months in prison, the time he has already served.
abstract: Bernard Laufer, Queens man who pleaded guilty to sending death threats to Council on American-Islamic Relations executive director Nihad Awad, is sentenced to three years supervised release and required to undergo mental health treatment; is also facing charges of attempted murder in 2012 stabbing of different man outside mosque in Queens.
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Laufer, who emailed a death threat to the head of an Islamic nonprofit organization, was sentenced to 13 months in prison, the time he has already served.

headline.main: Man Who Threatened Muslim Is Sentenced to 13 Months
headline.print_headline: No Jail Term for Threats Against a Muslim Man
